website_summaries.verdict: Not only do you get 12 balls with consistent performance for a good price when you pick these Wilsons, but you are choosing the official brand of the U.S. Open, which is a testament to the quality.
pros: Top-selling tennis balls that are known for their responsiveness and good bounce
A great  value too – 4 canisters consisting of 3 balls in each
cons: Very few consumers gripe about durability concerns

customer_reviews.title: High Quality - Reviewed by dogs
customer_reviews.text: Yes, I only buy premium tennis balls for my dogs but lesser quality balls get destroyed too easily (and by lesser quality I am still referring to tennis quality balls not those terrible pet store tennis-style balls). Not sure what kind of shinning review I am leaving or how this might relate to people that actually use them for tennis but my dogs have rated these 5 stars for quality.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Balls were flat out of the box
customer_reviews.text: I bought a 4-box pack since the price seemed very reasonable. I have only opened one box and played with it for a couple of minutes before realizing that all three balls in that box were flat. Too bad I can't returned the other unopened boxes. I will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: AKG

customer_reviews.title: Not sure about tennis players, but my dog loves these things
customer_reviews.text: I had been searching for a durable tennis ball for my French bulldog for months. The "dog toys" tennis balls just weren't holding up for them. He would chew through them within 2-3 hours. We have had these tennis balls for a month or so now, and they are holding up without any issues. They are extremely strong and he hasn't even been able to puncture them and he's a very aggressive chewer! Great product, a little expensive, but hey, not advertised for animals, more for tennis players.
customer_reviews.author: NDCallahan

customer_reviews.title: #1 among affordable balls
customer_reviews.text: Of the affordable balls, this is the best. It seems to last longer than the traditional Wilson or Penn balls. It is about twice the price, but I view it as a nominal price.
customer_reviews.author: DavidA

customer_reviews.title: Crushed 4-pack
customer_reviews.text: Dangerous crushed 4-pack. Whoever at Wilson put the plastic around the 4 cans used too much pressure and 2 of the cans had been squished like toothpaste with the metal seals and plastic lids misshapen and broken. The external amazon box seemed fine, so this is what I think happened. I cut my finger on it too. Angering. Will look at Penn or Dunlop in th future. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Anonym S.

customer_reviews.title: There are better balls which last longer
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for just 2 weeks and not on a professional grade, the balls have worn out pretty quickly. This is specifically for the US open balls. The other ones that I've tried are a bit better and stay longer. Idk if my court was freshly painted hence the balls are getting worn out but this seem to be not upto the mark. I will look for pro series or Penn pros for a better alternative
customer_reviews.author: Amogh

customer_reviews.title: Good quality ball, does not last long enough
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and make. However after about an hour of intense use, the ball starts to get really fuzzy and a bit more challenging to use. I expected it would retain it's newness longer. Still a better quality ball than most.
customer_reviews.author: Withered Tree Customer Service

customer_reviews.title: These are tough enough for our two large dogs and a chuck it toy
customer_reviews.text: These balls are tough enough for rough play with our large dogs, unless they are left alone to chew them. They arrived early in recyclable packaging. We bought multiples this time to cut down on waste.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great for hard court
customer_reviews.text: This is the third time I buy this summer. I play tennis about three times a week, and a can of new balls can last about three weeks. They are much better than Penn
customer_reviews.author: coolwinter

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and price
customer_reviews.text: Love it for tennis game for beginners. So far they works great and no issue with no pressure etc..
customer_reviews.author: Celion

customer_reviews.title: Super consistent experience
customer_reviews.text: Unlike the Penn balls I was using earlier, the Wilson balls are super consistent. Right out of the can they always have the same bounce and firmness. This ball plays exceptionally well outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: Thinc2

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I got tired of the disposable Penn balls I can get at Costco. Those balls would only last a few uses. These last for about a dozen uses and also don't have the surface imperfections of the cheaper balls.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting
customer_reviews.text: As a tennis player, it is always great to have tennis balls in your bag. These Wilson’s always has lasting power to where I can play several matches before recycling.
customer_reviews.author: Dixee Darling

customer_reviews.title: Tennis balls
customer_reviews.text: Been a while since I purchased and used. Played well. The balls were more "linty" and neon yellow than some other brands. I never tried soaking in water!
customer_reviews.author: Phil Wu

customer_reviews.title: My goto tennis balls!
customer_reviews.text: Will never play with any other type of tennis balls! These are the best!
customer_reviews.author: Salah Aldeen Al Saleh

customer_reviews.title: the ball was good
customer_reviews.text: the ball was hard and is extra duty, the package was good, after play for a while, the ball is still hard
customer_reviews.author: Hui

customer_reviews.title: Boxer-Mix Approved for Quality
customer_reviews.text: These tennis balls have held up for our hard playing Boxer baby. I figure that if they can pass her "rigid quality testing", then they will hopefully perform very well for those that enjoy playing tennis.
customer_reviews.author: carl ginsberg

customer_reviews.title: Delivers fast - Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Delivered fast! Exactly as described and great product. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Richard P. Meier II, MD MPH

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Dogs love them great ball for dogs to have as toys
customer_reviews.author: Pj

customer_reviews.title: Great balls but don't last very long
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty great balls, they bounce well but the only criticism I have fro them is that they get worn out after about 2-3 hour and a half long sessions so I ended up going through the four pack in about 2-3 weeks
customer_reviews.author: Dishad Chopra

customer_reviews.title: Study Balls
customer_reviews.text: Bought them for my black lab ,who destroys everything in sight. These balls great and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Dogmom

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Super Tennis balls! A convenient way to buy them. And of course you could always use the empty containers for other purposes later!
customer_reviews.author: Mama Knorr

customer_reviews.title: Quit looking for better tennis balls. This is it.
customer_reviews.text: These are the best balls that are worth using on the court. Anything else would be too frivolous unless you are playing professional, regulation tennis.
customer_reviews.author: Dave S

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy tennis balls for my pit bull.
customer_reviews.text: Durable tennis balls for my pitbull. He doesn't destroy them as quick as he does the cheaper made tennis balls.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: We will be buying these again, as we have two kids that love to play tennis! They are fairly priced.
customer_reviews.author: Paul & Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the extra $$$
customer_reviews.text: Don't last long at all.. no difference from Penn which is a lower price so I'll stick with Penn.
customer_reviews.author: DanTheMan27

customer_reviews.title: See above
customer_reviews.text: We actually use these for our planter issues we have with our feet and they are amazing at helping us overcome ailments with Planter. See you Physical Therapist for follow up.
customer_reviews.author: Manuel P. Ortega

customer_reviews.title: Stock up when there are dips in the prices.
customer_reviews.text: There are promotions every now and then, for around US$3-4 per can. Get it then, they are worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Wei

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: First off, I ordered the 4-ball canisters and got only 3 ball canisters. Secondly, these balls barely last a set of hard court play. Cannot recommend at all.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Cane-Honeysett

customer_reviews.title: Wilson US Open Extra Duty Tennis Ball
customer_reviews.text: arrived ahead of schedule; worked as advertised; product is more durable than anticipated
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good item
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift. the recipient of the gift liked it
customer_reviews.author: Amazing-Custer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: If you like tennis, then tennis balls are extremely important!
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Im a wilson guy. Prefer them over penn and other brands
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good tennis balls which can last for couple of
customer_reviews.text: Nothing big to review about a proven product in market. Pretty good tennis balls which can last for couple of sets
customer_reviews.author: Kamal

customer_reviews.title: Good performance
customer_reviews.text: Last Saturday tried it. Good performance. Suggest using US open, don't use championship. So much difference.
customer_reviews.author: princeliebe

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: this is my 2nd set. last longer than other balls i used. good stuff
customer_reviews.author: Shu Peng

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had known more about tennis balls
customer_reviews.text: Gave as gift He said it was a good choice
customer_reviews.author: customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my Pupper
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my dog. He lovesssss this brand. For the price they're durable and stba duo perfectly to his 100 pound Great Dane/Black Lab self. Here he is with three. We've had this brand for as long as we have had him - so almost 2 years. Good bounce. Durable. And long lasting.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth D

customer_reviews.title: Perfect on hard courts
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been playing these on hard courts indoor and outdoor and they are great.
customer_reviews.author: John Classic

customer_reviews.title: Best Tennis Balls
customer_reviews.text: Best tennis balls to hit with. Don't really like any other ones.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves them, she can't get enough of them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice !
customer_reviews.text: For my games on hard floor are very good !
customer_reviews.author: Ralph Rezende Rodrigues

customer_reviews.title: Two cans were flat
customer_reviews.text: Flat balls....... Two of the four cans were flat balls. Couldn't use them at all. The two that were not flat were good balls.
customer_reviews.author: Candi

customer_reviews.title: Wilson balls
customer_reviews.text: it's tennis balls, what can I say; they are fine
customer_reviews.author: VMW

customer_reviews.title: DOGS LOVE THEM
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love these! They can't even bite through them!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Never mind a total waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Totally bogus. 2 of my cans were totally flat balls. Embarrassing when you're the one who has to bring balls to the game. Never mind a total waste of money. Will never buy here again. Terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Emdoc

product_meta.title: US Open 3 Ball Can
product_meta.description: For the past 40+ years, every point at the US Open has been scored with a Wilson US Open tennis ball. Unparalleled consistency and performance make it the gold standard in tennis, trusted by the best in the game when it's all on the line. Crafted with premium woven felt, this ball is available in Extra Duty, Regular Duty and High Altitude variations.
feature_bullets: Approved by USTA and ITF for competitive play
Official Ball of the US Open
Extra Duty: Ideal performance on hard, abrasive courts
